name: Space Cassiera Simulator
description:
Space Cassiera Simulator is a totally accurate simulation of what it would be like to be a cashier in space. Survive one week in one of the most difficult and crazy jobs out there! Weird customers, crazy products, insane events. So, do you have what it takes to be a Space Cassiera?

*Cassiera = Cashier but in Italian

This is a project made by First Year students of Event Horizon Turin

Credits: Designers: Paolo Padello Tommaso Verde Alberto Cotevino Programmers: Alessio Sicoli Alessandro Pantano 2D Artists: Benedetta Abbate Edoardo Astegiano 3D Artists: Emma Nosengo Leonardo Assom Alberto Vassallo Sergio Pennisi
